alert.note: Alert for Barber; Comanche; Kiowa; Pratt (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:55PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Kiowa, northwestern Barber, northeastern Comanche and southern Pratt Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 955 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Sawyer to near Coldwater. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pratt and Sawyer around 1000 PM CDT. Isabel around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Belvidere and Sun City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
